title: Hour 1: Don't Rock the Boat
description:
Stephen A. is back on First Take but isn't quite ready to end his vacation... Michael Irvin joins him to debate their favorite topic: The Dallas Cowboys. Is it too early to hit the panic button on their season? Lamar Jackson gave the Ravens a Week 1 deadline for contract talks, but how much leverage does he really have? Stephen A. and Irvin decide whether these QBs will "Sink or Swim" this season with Harry Douglas and Keyshawn Johnson reacting in the studio.
